explains: adv. 间接地；不诚实；迂回地

sentences.en: Drugs are indirectly responsible for the violence.
sentences.cn: 毒品间接对暴力负有责任。

sentences.en: The new law will affect us all, directly or indirectly.
sentences.cn: 新的法规将直接或间接地影响我们所有的人。

sentences.en: The two sides would only meet indirectly, through middlemen.
sentences.cn: 双方只会通过中间人间接会晤。
